channel.title: CVE Feed for Wireshark Foundation -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Wireshark Foundation -- all products

item.title: CVE-2021-39924|2024-08-04T02:20:34.134Z -- wireshark%20foundation -- wireshark
item.description: Large loop in the Bluetooth DHT dissector in Wireshark 3.4.0 to 3.4.9 and 3.2.0 to 3.2.17 allows denial of service via packet injection or crafted capture file
